fields.descriptive_line: Computer Aided Design (CAD), black and white print out of the industrial design specification for the BT DECT handset, by Random Product Design Ltd, 1997.
fields.physical_description: Computer Aided Design (CAD), black and white print out of the industrial design specification for the DECT handset issued to the manufacturer.  Details elevations, sections and isometric view of handset with accompanying annotation and specification notes.
fields.title: Industrial design specification DECT handset
fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D, case KK, shelf 14
fields.marks:
'1. CASE FRONT: MOULDED ABS, MATT TEXTURE (BT-X2) / COLOUR AND GRAPHIC SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / 2. CASE REAR MOULDED ABS, MATT TEXTURE COLOUR AND GRAPHIC SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / 3. BATTERY COVER: MOULDED ABS MATT TEXTURE (BT-X2 / MATT TEXTURE COLOUR AND GRAPHIC SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / MANUFACTURER TO DETAIL  CLIPPING / 4. KEY FASCIA : MATT TEXTURE COLOUR AND GRAPHIC SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / NOTE: THIS IS A SEPERATE MOULDING FORM THE CASE FRONT. / 5. KEYS: MOULDED ABS CAPS MOUNTED ON TOP / OF RUBBER MATT AND POLYCARBONATE/METAL DOMES / NOTE: PROPOSED KEY ACTION 0.8MM / MANUFACTURER TO PREPARE SAMPLES FOR APPROVAL / BY BOTH BT AND RANDOM. / 6. CLIP ASSEMBLY: MOULDED ABS MATT TEXTURE ON / EXTERNAL SURFACES (BT-X2). MANUFACTURER TO DETAIL / ASSEMBLY. APPROVAL BY RANDOM. / NOTE: MANUFACTURER TO PREPARE ASSEMBLY TO TEST / DIFFERENT SPRING RATES FOR FEEL AND GRIP. / APPROVAL BY BT AND RANDOM. / 7. REPERTORY LENS: MOULDED ACRYLIC/POLYCARBONATE / HIGH GLOSS FINISH (BT-X1). MANUFACTURER TO DETAIL / CLIPPING. APPROVAL BY RANDOM. / NOTE: LENS TO BE RATTLE FREE. / 8. REPERTORY LABEL: DIE CUT CARD. MINIMUM WEIGHT 150GSM / COLOUR AND GRAPHIC SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / 9. VOLUME KEYS: SEE NOTE 5. / 10. CALLS LIGHT: MOULDED ACRYLIC/POLYCARBONATE / LIGHT PIPE ABOVE COLOURED LED HIGH GLOSS / FINISH (BT-X1) LED COLOUR SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / 11. LCD VERSION 1: / SCREEN LENS: REVERSE SCREEN PRINTED / COLOUR AND GRAPHICS SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / 12. LCD VERSION 2: COLUR AND GRAPHICS SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002. / 13. BATTERY PACK: SHOWN FOR LAYOUT PURPOSES ONLY. / 14. RF CAN : SHOWN FOR LAYOUT PURPOSES ONLY / 15. CHARGING CONTACTS: SHOWN FOR LAYOUT PURPOSES ONLY / 16. ANTENNA: SHOWN FOR LAYOUT PURPOSES ONLY / 17. EAR PIECE TRANSDUCER: SHOWN FOR LAYOUT PURPOSES ONLY / 18. MICROPHONE: SHOWN FOR LAYOUT PURPOSES ONLY / 19. BUZZER: SHOWN FOR LAYOUT PURPOSES ONLY / 20. HEADSET SOCKET: POSITION AND TYPE TO BE AGREED BY BOTH BT / AND RANDOM (NOT SHOWN). / 21. HEADSET SOCKET COVER: MOULDED RUBBER, MATT FINISH (BT-X2) / COLOUR SPECIFICATION ON BTM67-002 (NOT SHOWN) / 22. NECK CORD: BRAIDED NYLON LOOP COLOUR SPECIFICTATION ON BTM67-002 / MANUFACTURER TO SUBMIT SAMPLES FOR APPROVAL BY BT AND RANDOM.'
 'DO NOT SCALE / GEOMETRY AND DIMENSIONS CONTAINED IN THIS DRAWING ARE SUPPLIED FOR REFERENCE ONLY. / GEOMETRIC DATA FOR THE PRODUCT SURFACE DEFINITION SHOULD BE OBTAINED FROM THE / 3D MASTER DATABASE DRAWING NO: BTM67-006-1'
 'NOTE: / IF THE CLIP ASSEMBLY IS PULLED WITH EXCESSIVE PRESSURE WHEN THE / NECK CORD IS USED IT MUST BREAK AWAY FOR THE HANDSET, RATHER THAN CAUSE INJURY / BY BEING PERMANENTLY FIXED. / MANUFACTURER TO SUPPLY TEST RIG SO THAT A SUITABLE RELEASE / PRESSURE CAN BE DETERMINED. / BT AND RANDOM TO APPROVE.'
 'R1 around / volume button / bowls. / 9 / DATUM Z / DATUM X'
 'DATUM X / R5 around outside / of calls light aperture / 12 / FF / EE / DD / CC / BB / AA / R1 around all key bowls / Version 2 / 15 / SECTION F-F / SECTIONE-E / SECTION D-D / SECTION C-C / SECTION B-B / SECTION A-A /  DATUM Z / DATUM Z / DATUM Z / DATUM Z / DATUM Z / DATUM Z / DATUM Z'
 'R5 between ear bowl / and the lower surface / of the top cover. / 10 / R3 between key  surface / and the side surface / of the top case. / VERSION 1 / DATUM Y / 4 / R5 around LCD / aperture.'
 '1 / 2 / Are for proposed / position of / headset / socket. / 3 / DATUM Z'
 'R5 around outside of ear bowl. / AREA FOR PROPOSED POSITION OF HEADSET SOCKET. / 6 / 15 / 7 / R6 around rear case / IT MAY BE NECCESSARY / TO PUT A LABEL OR MOULED / GRAPHICS INSIDE THE BATTERY / COMPARTMENT. V-TECH AND RANDOM / TO DISCUSS. / DATUM Z / SECTION X-X / R8 AROUND INSIDE / OF EACH BOWL.'
 '22 / R1 all around clip / apperture. / R1 all around / repertory label aperture. / DATUM Y / 7 / 6 / 22'
 '3 / PUSH /  TO ACCESS / BATTERIES / View on rear / with repertory / lens and label / removed. / DATUM X /  Graphics to be moulded in and  / recessed 0.3mm / DATUM Y'
 'ALL EXTERNAL SURFACES TO BE CONSIDERED PRIMARY. / INTERVALS / 16 / 19 / 18 / 14 / 17 / 13 / 15'
 'DRG No: / BTM67-003 -1  SHEET 1 OF 1'
 'ISSUE  DATE / STATUS/MODIFICATIONS   DRAWN/ CHEKD / 1.  20/05/97   CRVW / MANUFACTURING ISSUE'
 'NOTES: / THIS DRAWING IS TO BE READ / IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE / DRAWINGS LISTED BELOW: / BTM67-004-1 / BTM67-005-1 / BTM67-006-1 (3-D HANDSET)'
 'DRAWING INFORMATION / RELATING TO UNDERSIDE / INTERNAL OR HIDDEN DETAIL / IS FOR FEASIBILITY / DISCUSSIONS ONLY. FINAL / UNDERSIDE, INTERNAL OR / HIDDEN DETAILS ARE THE / RESPONSIBILITY OF THE / MANUFACTURER. / THIS DRAWING IS NOT FOR / RELEASE TO PARTIES OTHER / THAN BT PLC AND THIRD / PARTIES EXPLICITLY / NOMINATED BY BT PLC.'
 'UNLESS OTHERWISE STATED: / 1. EXTERNAL RADII TO BE 0.25MM / 2. INTERNAL ANGLE TO BE 0.30MM / 3. DRAFT ANGLE TO BE 1 DEG / 4. GAPS BETWEEN KEYS AND / CABINET TO BE 0.15MM / PER SIDE / 5. PRODUCTION CLEARANCES / BETWEEN COMPONENTS / TO BE AGREED BY RANDOM. / 6. MOULD GATE POSITIONS TO / BE AGREED BY RANDOM. / 7. SHARP CASES AND WITNESS / MARKS TO TOOL INSERTS / TO BE AGREED BY RANDOM. / 8. THE QUALITY OF PRIMARY / SECONDARY AND TERTIARY / SURFACES ARE DEFINED BY / A BRITISH TELECOMMUNICATIONS QUALITY DOCUMENT. / THIS DOCUMNET SHOULD BE / REQUESTED DIRECTLY FORM THE / BT PRODUCT MANAGER / CONCERNED. / 9. ALL COLOUR AND GRAPHICS ARE / SPECIFIED ON DRAWING / BTM67-002. / PROVISIONAL / DEVELOPMENT INFORMATION ONLY / THIS DRAWING IS NOT FOR RELEASE TO PARTIES / OTHER THAN BRITISH TELECOMMUNICATIONS PLC. AND / ITS APPROVED SUPPLIERS. UNAUTHORISED / REPRODUCTION USE OR DISCLOSURE OF ANY MATERIAL / CONTAINED HEREIN IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED'
